courseSectionInformation: Approved for both letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in the same term up to 12 hours and separate terms up to 18 hours; MARCH students are limited to 12 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
description: Nature and scope of projects to be determined by consultation between student and faculty advisor; open to architecture and landscape architecture majors as well as those from other disciplines who wish to engage in interdisciplinary work. Approved for both letter and S/U grading. May be repeated in the same term up to 12 hours and separate terms up to 18 hours; MARCH students are limited to 12 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
label: Directed Research
